page.title: 05Mortimer Birthdays
page.content: Traditional birthday teas with party games are still enjoyed by many children. However, outings to local pleasure areas are becoming more common. "Inflatables" proliferate this year. In the home many parties rely on a hired entertainer or video film. Barbecued food is popular for summer birthdays. Cakes in the shape of numbers are quite common but many children request cakes based on favourite television programmes:- Thomas the Tank Engine, Super Ted, Postman Pat or the Wombles. For presents, BMX bikes, electronic games, cassettes with accompanying texts are popular. Another new trend is a robo- machine which changes from its original shape of car or aeroplane into something different - robot or dinosaur, simply by pulling and twisting various parts in sequence.
